attributes.action: demand the immediate reinststement of Jake The Police Dog
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jake, a cross bred German Shepherd dog has been forcibly retired from North Wales Police, due to his docile temprament. We demand that the Prime Ministers Office intervene, and ensure that Jake gets a second chance, or remedial aggressive training throughout a period where he can be assessed by an independent body !

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
